readable.title: 2247889670_413db8094b
readable.content: A man and a dog running across shallow water on a beach . A man and his dog walk on the ice of a frozen pond . A man dressed in winter clothes is on the beach wiht a dog . a man in a brown jacket is running on a sandy bay towards a dog that is in turn running towards him . The backview of a man dressed up in a jacket and a dog running towards him .
